name: Re Why?
description:
Try to be happy while solving puzzles. Use your record and rewind abilities to solve them. 

(Dev Note: Web build is not support saving progress. If you want to save your progress, download Windows or Mac builds.)



Controls

Move Left - A

Move Right - D

Jump - W

Record On/Off - Space

Remove Last Record - E

Reset Level - R

Sync All Records - O

Credits Code: Arefnue Design: Arefnue, Yamanefe Ugurlu Art: Sercan Uysal Audio: Yamanefe Ugurlu
